kw.name: Convert To Lowercase
kw.doc: Converts string to lowercase.

kw.name: Convert To Boolean
kw.doc: Converts the given item to Boolean true or false.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
